name: Eagle Hills (Belgrade Waterfront)
description: Belgrade Waterfront (Beograd na vodi) is a large-scale, urban development and revitalization project situated on the Sava River bank in the heart of Belgrade, Serbia. The project is designed as a modern, mixed-use complex featuring luxury residential buildings (such as BW Prima, BW Nika, etc.), high-end hotels (The St. Regis Belgrade), the Galerija shopping mall, and the landmark Kula Beograd (Belgrade Tower). It also includes extensive public spaces like the Sava Promenade and Savski Park.

name: AFI Europe Serbia
description: AFI Europe Serbia is a prominent international real estate investment and development company in Serbia. It focuses on developing large-scale, mixed-use complexes, particularly A-class office parks and residential projects. Key projects include Airport City Belgrade (a leading business park), the Skyline Belgrade residential and business complex, and the AFI City Zmaj logistics and office park. AFI Europe has been operating in Serbia for over 20 years.

name: Galens Invest
description: Galens Invest is one of the leading Serbian construction and investment companies, primarily focused on developing high-quality residential and commercial real estate projects. Based in Serbia, the company operates across key locations including Belgrade, Novi Sad, Zlatibor (Serbia), and Jahorina (Bosnia and Herzegovina), emphasizing modern design and high construction standards. Their portfolio includes large-scale complexes such as Pupin's Palace and New Minel.

name: Merin Holdings
description: Merin Group is one of the leading real estate investment and project development companies based in Belgrade, Serbia. They specialize in developing both residential and commercial properties, focusing on modern design and contemporary living. Their active projects often include residential complexes in Belgrade such as Casa Verde, Silva Vidikovac, and Big Residences.

name: MPC Properties
description: MPC Properties has been a pioneer within commercial real estate sector since its founding in 2002. They have successfully completed over 30 projects by fusing innovative design with environmentally friendly methods.

name: Energoprojekt
description: Energoprojekt Holding a.d. Beograd is a venerable Serbian company that was founded in 1951, initially specializing in power generation and water management projects. It has since grown into one of the largest firms in Southeast Europe, focusing on design, consulting, engineering, and construction services. The company has achieved an impressive global footprint, undertaking and successfully completing projects in over 70 countries across four continents.

name: PSP Farman
description: SP-Farman Holding is an international company with over 30 years of experience in the real estate, development, design, and construction business, with its headquarters in Belgrade, Serbia. The company prides itself on delivering unique projects that meet the newest standards of design and technology, handling the entire process from initial planning to final execution.

name: Zoned
description: Zoned Grupacija is a Serbian real estate investment and development group with over 20 years of experience. They specialize in the construction and sale of high-quality residential, commercial, and hotel properties across Serbia. Their portfolio includes projects in major cities like Novi Sad and Belgrade, as well as luxury apartment complexes in the mountain resort Kopaonik (e.g., Zoned Panorama). The company emphasizes modern construction, functionality, and full legal compliance of its properties.

name: Shikun & Binui (New Venture Red doo)
description: Shikun & Binui (or Shikun u Binui) is a major Israeli-based global business group with a history dating back to 1924. The company operates through subsidiaries worldwide, focusing on four primary business segments: Infrastructure and Construction, Real Estate Development, Energy, Concessions. The company has a strong commitment to sustainability across its global operations.

name: Elixir Group
description: Elixir Group is a large, diversified Serbian holding company headquartered in Šabac. It is primarily known as a regional leader in the following key sectors:Chemical Industry(Focusing heavily on the production and distribution of complex mineral (NPK) fertilizers), Agribusiness and Trading(Significant involvement in trading raw materials and finished agricultural products), Real Estate(The company is also a major investor and developer of high-quality residential and commercial projects, such as the Elixir Garden complex in New Belgrade).

name: Granit Invest
description: Granit Invest d.o.o. is a family-owned Serbian real estate investment and construction company with a focus on developing high-end residential buildings and premium commercial spaces in Belgrade. The company emphasizes a combination of superior quality, contemporary design, and functionality, using high-grade materials and adhering to the latest construction standards. Their portfolio includes major projects such as the Green Square business center and various luxury residential buildings.

name: Karin Komerc
description: Karin Komerc MD d.o.o. is a complex Serbian construction and industry system based in Veternik (Novi Sad). Karin Komerc is known for controlling the full project cycle and utilizing its own resources, having contributed to major infrastructure projects like the Linglong Factory Complex and the Čortanovci Viaduct and Tunnel. The company provides an integrated service across the construction sphere, encompassing production and sale, execution and transport.

name: Greda
description: "Greda" (Greda GP) is a construction and real estate company founded in Valjevo, Serbia, in 1994. The company functions as a comprehensive developer, handling everything from securing locations and project financing to construction, execution, and sales of newly built residential and commercial spaces. Their project portfolio is focused primarily on high-quality apartment complexes in Valjevo and Belgrade (e.g., Kvart 64 in New Belgrade), and they have also executed projects in tourist locations like Zlatibor and Divčibare.

name: Exing B&P
description: EX ING B&P is a highly successful Serbian construction and engineering company with over three decades of experience on the domestic and regional market. The company operates as an integrated system, handling construction, engineering services, and specialized manufacturing (including steel structures, fireproof d.o.o.rs, and Inox products). EX ING is known for its involvement in major residential, commercial, and industrial developments, particularly in Belgrade. Their portfolio includes landmark projects such as Voždove kapije, Skyline, Wellport.

name: Dijagoninvest
description: Dijagoninvest is a reliable investment company in Serbia focused on the construction and sale of residential and commercial properties in Novi Sad and Belgrade. The company leverages decades of experience in construction and project design. Key characteristics include quality guarantee and efficiency focus. Their most well-known development is the large residential and commercial complex Blok D on Bulevar Evrope in Novi Sad.

name: Vagres Ing d.o.o.
description: Vagres Ing. D.O.O. is a Serbian construction and development company founded in Niš in 1996, with over 25 years of experience. The company operates a fully integrated process, handling everything from project design and documentation to construction and sales of high-quality residential buildings. Its primary focus is on developing large-scale housing complexes in Niš, such as the completed Vagres City (a large complex with over 550 units) and the currently active Sunny Hill residential complex.

name: Victory Gardens d.o.o.
description: Victory Gardens d.o.o. is the development company (developer/investitor) behind the Victory Gardens residential complex in Belgrade. The project is substantial, consisting of multiple buildings (such as Olive and Ivy) offering a total of several hundred apartments and parking spaces.In essence, Victory Gardens d.o.o. is a specialized developer focused on delivering a single, large, premium residential project.

name: Rapid Invest d.o.o.
description: Rapid Invest is a construction and investment company based in Novi Sad, Serbia, with a portfolio of over 20 successfully completed projects. They specialize in developing high-quality, long-lasting residential and commercial properties, emphasizing durability and prestigious design. Their current key project is the large-scale Novella Business-Residential Complex (located on Futoški put 51 in Novi Sad), which features 279 apartments across three residential buildings and a substantial commercial building.

name: Maison Royal d.o.o.
description: Maison Royale by Stefial is the luxury real estate brand of the development company Stefial d.o.o. Belgrade. They specialize in developing and investing in exclusive, high-end residential and commercial properties (often boutique buildings) located in the most prestigious and central areas of Belgrade (e.g., Vračar, Kosančićev Venac). The parent company, Stefial d.o.o., highlights its over 20 years of experience in the luxury real estate market. Maison Royale projects are defined by premium materials, impeccable aesthetics, and functionality, aiming to deliver an exclusive lifestyle to a clientele that demands the highest standards.

name: K8 Properties d.o.o.
description: K8 Properties (or K8 Invest) is a Belgrade-based company primarily focused on sustainable construction and green architecture. They specialize in the design and construction of real estate projects that prioritize energy efficiency, environmental responsibility, and ecological standards. Their popular project is NEBESSA Kvart on New Belgrade. This is marketed as the first residential and commercial complex in the region to feature a jogging and walking track on the rooftop park.

name: Maus Invest d.o.o.
description: MAUS INVEST d.o.o. Beograd-Novi Beograd (PIB 111146266) is a small enterprise founded on November 14, 2018. Based in New Belgrade, its primary activity is the development of construction projects, functioning as a real estate investor/developer.

name: Alterra Gradnja d.o.o.
description: Alterra Gradnja is a Belgrade-based real estate developer specializing in the construction of high-quality, energy-efficient residential and commercial complexes. The founders have over a decade of experience in the construction sector. They concentrate on developing modern, functional apartments in smaller residential communities, a concept they liken to Western European models. Their main projects are located in the Zemun municipality (Altina and Batajnica), notably the complex "Nova Altina" and "Nova Batajnica", which prioritize quality construction and good infrastructural connections.

name: SPV Luxury Complex Svetosavska d.o.o.
description: Since SPV LUXURY COMPLEX SVETOSAVSKA D.O.O. is a legal entity registered as a limited liability company (D.O.O.), its primary activity is the construction of residential and non-residential buildings. As the name suggests (SPV stands for Special Purpose Vehicle), this company was most likely established as a dedicated investment platform (developer) solely for the purpose of realizing a single luxury residential or commercial complex located in or near Svetosavska Street in Belgrade.

name: Novi Square d.o.o.
description: NOVI SQUARE d.o.o. Belgrade (PIB 112566929) is a micro-enterprise founded on July 6, 2021. Although primarily registered for Architectural Activities, the company is heavily involved in real estate project development.

name: TRLIĆ GRADNJA D.O.O.
description: TRLIĆ GRADNJA DOO UB is a micro-enterprise established in Ub, Serbia on May 11, 2017, specializing in the construction and development of residential and non-residential buildings.

name: Trgomen nekretnine
description: TRGOMEN NEKRETNINE DOO BEOGRAD (PIB 106984709) is a Serbian construction and development company founded on July 28, 2011. The company operates as a developer/investor, specializing in the construction of residential and non-residential buildings. They are primarily active in the Belgrade real estate market, often focusing on developing small to medium-sized residential buildings in areas such as the Voždovac municipality (e.g., Medaković, Jajinci).

name: Smart gradnja d.o.o.
description: SMART GRADNJA DOO BEOGRAD is a micro-enterprise founded on October 17, 2011, operating primarily as a developer/investor in the construction of residential and non-residential buildings.

name: Big CEE
description: BIG CEE INVESTOR d.o.o. Belgrade is a construction and investment company established on October 3, 2017. The company operates as a developer/investor specializing in the construction of residential and non-residential buildings. They concentrate on developing residential projects primarily within the Belgrade area. This entity is separate from the large retail group, BIG CEE.

name: Delta Real Estate(Delta Holding)
description: Delta Real Estate began its journey by developing major commercial projects primarily in Serbia, Montenegro, and Bulgaria, establishing itself as a market leader in retail and office space. The company is known for bringing international standards of construction, design, and management to the local markets. Today, Delta Real Estate focuses on a balanced portfolio of office, hotel, and retail properties, confirming its position as a major regional player in commercial real estate. Key projects: Delta City, Crowne Plaza, Delta Planet, Hotel InterContinental

name: Nova Vizantija d.o.o.
description: Founded on May 12, 2021, NOVA VIZANTIJA DOO Beograd quickly established itself in the Belgrade construction market as a developer and investor specializing in the construction of residential and non-residential buildings. Despite its recent establishment, the company operates on a scale large enough to be officially classified as a large enterprise.

name: GOOD Properties
description: GOOD PROPERTIES DOO is a highly reliable and financially robust real estate developer based in New Belgrade, founded on August 30, 2018. The company specializes in the construction of residential and non-residential buildings.

name: MD Ventures d.o.o.
description: MD VENTURES DOO is a micro-enterprise based in Novi Sad, Serbia, established on November 10, 2022. The company is part of the larger MD Group and operates as a real estate developer, with a primary focus on the construction of residential and non-residential buildings. Their most significant project is the PC ELEVEN commercial building in Novi Sad, an ambitious development aiming for the prestigious LEED Platinum certification, making it the first project of its kind in the city to achieve this top international standard for green and sustainable construction.

name: Sunnyville d.o.o.
description: The developer of the large "Sunnyville" residential complex in Višnjička Banja, Belgrade. They focus on delivering functional apartments with a good price-to-quality ratio, aiming to transform suburban areas into modern living communities.

name: Marina Dorćol d.o.o.
description: The Marina Dorćol project, developed (invested in) by the Czech company SEBRE (through its local firm SEBRE MARINA DORĆOL d.o.o. Beograd), represents one of the largest foreign investments in Serbia, estimated at around 390 million euros.

name: Millenium Team
description: One of the largest construction companies in Serbia. They participate heavily in national infrastructure projects (e.g., gasification, hydro-engineering) and are also a major developer of significant commercial and residential complexes (e.g., West 65).

name: AFI Group
description: An international (Israeli) development group known for creating large shopping centers and business parks across the region. Their key projects in Belgrade include Airport City Belgrade and significant retail developments.

name: UDI Alfa d.o.o.
description: The company's main activity is investment and development of residential and commercial properties, particularly known for large-scale, high-quality projects. UDI Alfa Group is part of a larger group of companies with international experience in the real estate sector. Their project "Lastavice" (meaning "Swallows" or "Swallow Houses") is designed as a modern, urban residential complex, characterized by contemporary architecture, high construction quality, and carefully planned common areas and green spaces.

name: ABL Solvent
description: A real estate firm engaged in investment, construction, and sales of residential and commercial properties, emphasizing stability and build quality in its projects.

name: BDS Properties
description: BDS Properties is a member of the BDS Group, which is well-known in the region for companies like Sport Vision, Sport Time, and Planeta Sport. The Group has international experience with several thousand employees across 13 countries. Their project Soul64 is planned to include multiple residential and commercial buildings (9 buildings in total according to some sources). The complex will feature a 400-meter long park. The entire area inside the complex will be pedestrian-only (no car traffic), which is considered a luxury feature.

name: BG-Invest 2021
description: A relatively newer developer, established in 2021, specializing in residential building construction across the Belgrade metropolitan area.

name: Termo Tim d.o.o.
description: Although they are the investor for D12 Residence, their primary registered activity and main area of expertise is engineering and construction of complex installations, including thermo-technical, hydro-technical (plumbing and water supply), and air conditioning/HVAC systems. The company was founded in 2004. Their portfolio includes work on some of the largest and most prominent commercial and residential buildings in Belgrade, such as: Ada Mall, Hilton Hotel, Novi Dorćol, K-District..

name: NDN Eagle Construction
description: NDN Eagle Construction D.O.O. is a relatively new Belgrade-based company, primarily engaged in the construction of residential and non-residential buildings.The company's focus is on attractive, central locations, particularly in the Vračar municipality of Belgrade like Politova 1 (Vračar) and Šumatovačka 159 (Vračar).

name: Scordia International Properties
description: SCORDIA is involved in the development and sale of residential and commercial properties in both Serbia and Bosnia and Herzegovina (BiH). Their project portfolio includes properties in prestigious and popular neighborhoods: Vračar, Zemun, Voždovac. Jahorina...

name: Lazović Gradnja d.o.o.
description: The company Lazović Gradnja d.o.o. is acting as the Construction Company (Izvođač radova) for a new residential building complex being sold by Borexport DOO. This specific project is located at Jerneja Kopitara 6 in Novi Sad and consists of two buildings: Building 1 (Su+P+3) and Building 2 (Po+P+2). The construction work officially started in July 2024, and the expected completion date is October 2025.

name: Ingrap-Omni
description: Ingrap-Omni d.o.o. is a large Serbian engineering and construction company based in Belgrade, distinguished by its full-spectrum involvement in construction, acting as both an investor and a contractor. The company has a history spanning over 30 years and possesses significant internal production capabilities, including asphalt plants, concrete mixing plants, and quarries, which allows them excellent control over material quality and construction deadlines. The OMNI PLAZA project is one of their major high-rise developments located in the Nova Galenika neighborhood of Zemun. It is conceived as a multi-functional complex that integrates residential, commercial, and business spaces, spanning over 50,000 square meters gross area and is being developed in multiple phases.

name: Tatarsko Brdo Residence D.O.O.
description: TATARSKO BRDO RESIDENCE DOO is a real estate investment and construction company based in Novi Sad, established on September 9, 2020. Their primary business activity is the construction of residential and non-residential buildings.  The company's major and most prominent project is the VERDE 11 residential complex, located on Tatarsko Brdo in Sremska Kamenica, near Novi Sad. Verde 11 is marketed as a large, gated community complex situated near nature, often referred to as a "city in miniature." The complex comprises a total of 11 buildings (lamelas), featuring 331 apartments, 451 garage spaces, and 16 commercial spaces.

name: Novi Square d.o.o.
description: NOVI SQUARE DOO is a real estate investment and development company based in Belgrade, which has established itself by focusing on the construction of modern, residential buildings. The company is registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings. NOVI SQUARE DOO is a real estate investment and development company based in Belgrade, which has established itself by focusing on the construction of modern, residential buildings. The company is registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings. While the company's financial details are subject to routine business checks, their visibility is primarily tied to their key residential project.Their main project is the VILA BANJICA residential complex, located in the Banjica neighbourhood of Belgrade, specifically at the intersection of Bulevar oslobođenja and Bulevar JNA. The complex is designed to offer contemporary living with an emphasis on quality construction and a desirable location, providing easy access to both the city centre and major traffic routes.

name: Airport Garden d.o.o.
description: The company name suggests a focus on developing complexes in the commercial zones or areas near the Belgrade "Nikola Tesla" Airport.

name: RESIDENCE 7 PLUS d.o.o.
description: RESIDENCE 7 PLUS DOO is a company based in Belgrade, primarily engaged as a developer and investor in residential construction. The company is perhaps best known for the residential complex after which it is named, the Residence 7 Plus project in Zemun. This complex is characterized by modern design and a focus on high construction standards, often featuring premium materials and thoughtful layouts.

name: Ecstatika dt doo
description: ECSTATIKA DT D.O.O. is a Belgrade-based company specializing in the development and construction of high-end, luxury residential and commercial properties. The firm has established a strong reputation by focusing on premium locations and implementing demanding architectural standards, aiming to deliver top-tier quality in construction and finishing materials. Their marketing and sales strategy often targets the luxury segment of the market, relying heavily on direct sales, dedicated sales agents, and real estate portals, rather than extensive public engagement via traditional social media. Their portfolio primarily consists of exclusive, modern urban projects like Ctenral Palace and Cvijićeva Palata

name: Vukša Inženjering d.o.o.
description: A company involved in comprehensive engineering and construction work, with active participation in building residential properties, primarily in Belgrade.

name: Tesla Construction
description: TESLA CONSTRUCTION D.O.O. (registered in New Belgrade with a high A+ credit rating) is acting as the developer/investor for the high-end Dorćol Prime building. The involvement of a company primarily focused on energy production suggests a high standard for the building’s efficiency and technological features. Dorćol Prime is an exclusive residential project located in Donji Dorćol, within the cultural and historical core of Belgrade, offering a quiet, secure lifestyle while being only a seven-minute walk from Republic Square and Knez Mihailova Street.

name: RBIGROUP D.O.O.
description: The RBI Group, standing for Raiffeisen Bank International, is the key corporate and investment arm that operates the vast international network of the wider Austrian Raiffeisen Banking Group. The Group's official digital presence is maintained at https://rbigroup.org/. While the modern RBI AG structure was established in 2017, its operations are built upon the long-standing heritage of the Raiffeisen organization. RBI leverages platforms such as LinkedIn and YouTube for professional communication and corporate updates across its numerous markets.

name: Serbia Prime Site One AG
description: OGRANAK SERBIA PRIME SITE ONE AG BEOGRAD is the Belgrade branch of the Swiss-based Serbia Prime Site One AG, registered in 2021 with the primary activity of constructing residential and non-residential buildings. This investor focuses exclusively on the high-end, luxury segment of the Belgrade real estate market, with plans for a significant investment, often cited around 40 million Swiss Francs. Their main project is the King's Fountain (Kraljeva česma) luxury complex located at Velisava Vulovića 51 in Dedinje, close to the White Palace.

name: PEROSE Property Group
description: PEROSE PROPERTY GROUP D.O.O. is a brand-new real estate investment company based in Belgrade (Vračar), established very recently on October 27, 2025. It is fully owned by the foreign entity Perose Real Estate LLC, indicating a fresh entry of foreign capital into the Serbian development market. The company is formally registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings.

name: LOTUS REAL ESTATE MANAGEMENT D.O.O.
description: LOTUS REAL ESTATE MANAGEMENT D.O.O. is a small, boutique developer registered in Belgrade (founded in July 2021) that focuses exclusively on the development and construction of premium residential properties in the most attractive locations within the Savski Venac municipality, primarily in the Dedinje and Senjak neighborhoods. The company functions as the project owner, acquiring land, engaging architectural firms (such as its sister companies Lotus Architecti and LAD 1 Studio), hiring a general contractor, and securing brokers for unit sales. Projects are financed through capital from their parent company in Switzerland, LOTUS REAL ESTATE PROPERTIES AG (Zug), supplemented by local bank loans. Their developments typically target a net residential area between 1,000 m² and 1,800 m², with apartments ranging from 60 m² to 250 m², and they promise a maximum construction duration of 30 months. Their inaugural project in Belgrade is the D'HOME – TOWNHOUSE RESIDENCE in Dedinje

name: DiPeM d.o.o. and Falcon Group
description: DIPeM d.o.o. is a well-established Serbian company founded in 1990 in Čačak, with its primary and core business historically centered on the automotive industry. For years, DIPeM has been the accredited Mazda partner and exclusive distributor for Serbia, with a robust network of sales and service centers in both Čačak and New Belgrade. The company has repeatedly won the prestigious 'Customer 1st Award' from Mazda, underscoring its commitment to high standards and customer service in the automotive sector.

name: GD Napred ad
description: As one of Serbia's oldest and largest general contractors, GD Napred is a traditional giant in construction and engineering. They are involved in massive governmental infrastructure projects while also developing significant residential and commercial real estate complexes, such as the famous Genex Tower reconstruction.

name: LixiFront Invest d.o.o.
description: This developer/investor focuses on building residential properties, often aiming for the premium segment of the market. Their projects typically emphasize modern amenities, high architectural standards, and strong investment value.

name: Pavlović Invest
description: Primarily focused on developing modern residential buildings in the wider central areas and suburbs of Belgrade (e.g., Zvezdara, Palilula). Through projects like "Residential Complex Pavlović," they aim to deliver quality construction and highly functional apartment layouts to the mid-to-high segment of the market.

name: Lux Invest Internacional
description: As the name suggests, the company is geared towards high-end investments, targeting luxury residential and commercial properties. They focus on financing projects that require premium materials, superior design, and exclusive urban locations.

name: Gra-Vet Invest d.o.o.
description: A strong developer presence in the Novi Sad and surrounding Srem region, specializing in residential building construction. They execute projects emphasizing durability and adherence to urban planning standards, often developing properties in the city's expanding zones.

name: Brixwell Investment
description: The company primarily invests its capital in attractive and desirable locations in Belgrade, focusing on luxury new construction of both residential and commercial buildings. Their architecture and design philosophy emphasize elegance, refinement, aesthetics, and functionality. They aim to create properties that offer a superior lifestyle and meet the highest standards of quality. Key projects often mentioned include residential and commercial complexes on Vračar (e.g., in Loznička and Stojana Protića streets) and a large residential-business complex in Dorćol, known as "The Dorcol Residence."

name: DREAM HOME D.O.O.
description: While the specific business entity in Voždovac may not prominently display dedicated social media profiles in public registers, it is generally associated with the broader "Dream Home Real Estate" brand which is active in the Serbian property development market, particularly in Novi Sad and Belgrade. The company's online activity is primarily centralized on their official website, https://dreamhome.rs/, where details about their residential and commercial projects are showcased. The direct email listed for the Voždovac entity in some business records is dreamhomebeograd@gmail.com.

name: Pronix d.o.o. Novi Sad
description: While linked to engineering, this entity is often involved in implementing advanced technological and smart building solutions in commercial and residential structures in Novi Sad. They merge traditional construction practices with modern IT and engineering integration.

name: Erker Inženjering
description: A key, large-scale developer in Novi Sad, famous for massive residential engineering and construction projects. They focus on rapidly increasing the city's housing stock, especially in areas like Detelinara, delivering a high volume of functional apartments.

name: D-DALTON D.O.O.
description: This company primarily specializes in the execution of demanding construction works and engineering services. They often serve as a reliable contractor for complex architectural projects, emphasizing technical precision and adherence to high building standards in their structural work.

name: Dijagonala Espro BP d.o.o.
description: Starting as a real estate consultancy and agency, the company has actively transitioned into a role as an investor and project manager. They leverage their deep market knowledge to develop targeted residential and commercial projects, focusing on attractive locations within the Belgrade area.

name: NIKS Construction d.o.o.
description: The firm concentrates on the execution of all construction phases and engineering. Known as a contractor who maintains strict adherence to deadlines and technical specifications, they participate in the realization of various residential and commercial buildings.

name: Sandei  doo
description: These entities most likely represent partner companies in Joint Ventures (JVs) or Special Purpose Vehicles (SPVs) established to carry out specific, collaboratively financed residential complexes. They pool their capital and expertise to manage project development.

name: FP Gradnja
description: An active developer engaged in the construction of new residential units, keeping pace with current market trends. Their goal is to offer quality accommodation at competitive prices, often focusing on functional designs in attractive urban neighborhoods.

name: VIP HOME D.O.O. POŽAREVAC
description: This is a regionally focused developer dedicated to residential construction in Požarevac and the surrounding region. Their projects are tailored to meet local market needs, providing modern and reliable housing options.

name: Park Forest Residence d.o.o.
description: PARK FOREST RESIDENCE DOO NOVI SAD is a small enterprise registered in Novi Sad in 2021, specializing in the construction of residential and non-residential buildings. The company is co-owned by three individuals, is active and not currently blocked

name: Kesser Gradnja d.o.o.
description: Operates as both an investor and a contractor in the residential sector. The company focuses on the complete realization of projects, from land acquisition to final finishing works, emphasizing quality and functional construction standards.

name: UDI Group
description: A large international investment group (European/Israeli capital) involved in developing commercial, logistics, and residential projects across Europe, including significant investments in the Serbian market.

name: United City Group
description: A developer primarily focused on large urban complexes and high-volume residential construction in city centers. Their projects often involve mixed-use developments that combine housing with commercial and retail spaces.

name: Planet Capital
description: Likely an investment fund or financial group specializing in structuring and allocating capital to real estate ventures. They manage the investment portfolio and provide financial support for large-scale development projects.

name: Clean Earth Capital
description: An investment group with a strong focus on sustainable and "green" development. They specialize in projects that use eco-friendly materials and promote sustainable living (e.g., the Sunčana strana Fruške Gore project).

name: Wolf Invest d.o.o.
description: A local investor active in the real estate sector. Their focus is on the acquisition of land and the development of residential properties, primarily small-to-medium-sized buildings.

name: Home 4You d.o.o.& Avala Invest d.o.o.
description: Two partner companies that often collaborate (Joint Venture) to jointly execute residential projects. They combine capital and expertise to streamline the construction and development process.

name: ST-Construction d.o.o.
description: A company focused on construction execution and engineering services. They likely act as a contractor for projects led by other investors, ensuring the physical build meets the highest technical standards.

name: Worbax d.o.o.
description: A developer and investor active in residential and/or commercial construction, with a focus on proactive participation in the development of urban areas.

name: Concrete land
description: An Investor/Developer known for creating luxury residential complexes, such as the White Hill Residence. They specialize in properties situated on elevated ground, offering panoramic views and a premium living experience.

name: CITY ROOF d.o.o.
description: CITY ROOF D.O.O. is a real estate development and construction company registered in Nova Pazova, Serbia. The legal entity was officially founded quite recently, on April 11, 2023. Despite being a new company, it is active in the market, often involved in new residential developments. A notable project associated with the firm is the Vračar Lux Residence complex. This project is promoted as a high-quality residential development in one of Belgrade's most sought-after neighborhoods, Vračar, emphasizing modern design, premium construction materials, and proximity to city amenities.

name: Graditelj Inženjering
description: The company KOMPANIJA GRADITELJ-INŽENJERING ZA MENADŽMENT I ORGANIZACIJU GRAĐENJA DOO BEOGRAD is one of the longest-standing active construction companies in Belgrade, formally established on December 26, 1980, though it claims a tradition extending over half a century (dating back to 1968). This active private limited company is registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings and is notably the founder of the "Union Nikola Tesla" University.

name: IMEL Group
description: The IMEL Group is one of the oldest privately owned engineering and real estate firms in Belgrade, with its formal corporate entity established in 1991 and a professional tradition extending back to 1981. The company has played a key role in the urban development of New Belgrade, where its projects have become recognizable symbols of the modern cityscape. IMEL provides a complete spectrum of services, encompassing engineering, architecture, design, and construction, but it also specializes heavily in real estate management and leasing of high-quality commercial spaces, often generating significant results in this segment.

name: Aleksandar Gradnja
description: Aleksandar Gradnja is one of the most prominent and experienced private construction companies in Novi Sad, officially founded on September 2, 1994. Over three decades, the company has grown into a major regional developer, focusing on high-quality mass residential construction, primarily concentrated in Novi Sad and its surrounding areas, with some notable projects also in Belgrade.

name: Vidikovac Vista d.o.o.
description: VIDIKOVAC VISTA D.O.O. BEOGRAD is a recently established real estate investment and development company, officially founded on April 28, 2023. The company is registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings and quickly positioned itself in the premium segment of the market. Its namesake and flagship project is the Vidikovac Vista residential complex, located in the Vidikovac area of Belgrade. This project emphasizes modern, high-quality urban living and is designed to take advantage of its elevated position, offering apartments with panoramic views.

name: Simgrad d.o.o. Čačak
description: SIMGRAD DOO ČAČAK is an experienced, privately owned construction and engineering company based in Čačak, Serbia, officially established on July 27, 1998. The company specializes in the construction of residential and non-residential buildings, establishing a reliable track record in its home region and expanding its activities to other parts of Serbia. Simgrad operates as a highly integrated firm, covering the entire development process from investment and project design to execution, ensuring control over construction quality and deadlines.

name: Prestige Line Invest d.o.o. Subotica
description: PRESTIGE LINE INVEST DOO BEOGRAD is a recently founded real estate development and investment company, officially established on February 27, 2023. The company is registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings and has quickly begun to establish a presence in the Belgrade market. As its name suggests, the firm appears focused on developing properties intended for the premium or luxury segment, aiming to deliver high-quality construction standards and exclusive features in its projects.

name: Keser Inženjering
description: KESER INŽENJERING 2020 D.O.O. is a significant construction and investment company based in Ruma, Serbia, officially founded on January 9, 2020. While the company itself is relatively new, it carries the substantial experience of its predecessor, SM INVEST, which operated since 2012. The firm specializes in the construction of high-quality residential and commercial buildings, primarily in Ruma, with expansion into locations like Vrdnik and Petrovaradin.

name: SU-PPROSPECT D.O.O. SUBOTICA
description: SU PROSPECT DOO SUBOTICA is a well-established private construction and real estate development company based in Subotica, Serbia, officially founded on March 18, 2011. The company specializes in the construction of high-quality residential and commercial buildings, concentrating its activities primarily within the city of Subotica and the wider region of Vojvodina. SU Prospect operates with a focus on comprehensive solutions, managing projects from initial design and investment through to final construction and sales.

name: DG Company d.o.o. Subotica
description: This company is an experienced and highly stable construction firm based in Subotica. Although the firm's legal entity was officially founded on March 9, 1992. The company has an extensive portfolio, including residential and commercial complexes in Subotica such as the Business-Residential building "Zora" (Radijalac) and complexes in Prozivka and Braće Radić. It is known for initiating an international architectural competition for one of its street facades.

name: Skyline 021 d.o.o.
description: SKYLINE GRADNJA 021 D.O.O. is a real estate development and investment company based in Novi Sad, officially founded on April 28, 2022. The company is registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings and quickly positioned itself in the highly competitive Novi Sad market. Although the company itself is relatively new, its name and activity suggest a focus on modern, high-rise or significantly large urban projects, given the use of the term "Skyline."

name: Kubit Invest d.o.o.
description: KUBIT INVEST D.O.O. BEOGRAD is a newly established real estate investment and development company, officially founded on April 28, 2023. The company is registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings and has swiftly entered the Belgrade market, focusing on the development of new urban properties. As a very recent market entrant, Kubit Invest aims to build its reputation through modern, quality-focused projects.

name: Home & Villas One d.o.o.
description: HOME AND VILLAS ONE D.O.O. is a real estate investment and development company based in Belgrade, officially founded on April 4, 2023. The company is registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings, with a clear focus, as indicated by its name, on developing high-end, exclusive residential properties—specifically homes and villas—rather than traditional large apartment complexes. This specialization suggests the company targets the luxury segment of the market, emphasizing privacy, premium design, and superior construction quality, likely in prestigious suburban areas around Belgrade.

name: Home & Villas Two d.o.o.
description: HOME AND VILLAS TWO D.O.O. is a real estate investment and development company based in Belgrade, officially founded very recently on May 9, 2025. This company is a sister entity to Home and Villas One D.O.O. and is also registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings. Despite its very recent establishment, it continues the group's clear strategy: focusing on developing subsequent high-end, luxury residential projects—specifically private homes and villas—rather than traditional apartment blocks.

name: Home & Villas Three d.o.o.
description: HOMES&VILLAS THREE D.O.O. is a real estate development company officially established on February 26, 2020. The company belongs to the broader Homes&Villas group of entities, which is focused exclusively on the luxury residential segment in prime locations in Belgrade, primarily Vračar and Dedinje. This entity is majority-owned by a related company, Homes&Villas Plus D.O.O.

name: BEKAMENT
description: This Belgrade-based entity is registered for Engineering, Trade, and Services and primarily deals with professional, scientific, and technical activities, including consulting and engineering services, operating out of an office on Ustanička Street. It is important to distinguish this service and consulting firm from the main production and financially largest company in the group, which is BANJA KOMERC BEKAMENT D.O.O. BANJA ARANĐELOVAC.

name: Invest global group 021
description: INVEST GLOBAL GROUP D.O.O. is a real estate investment and development company based in Belgrade, officially founded on April 26, 2022. The company is registered for the construction of residential and non-residential buildings and has established itself as an active participant in the Belgrade property market. It focuses on the development of modern residential and commercial complexes, primarily acting as the investor who initiates, finances, and oversees the construction of projects.
